Typography

Typography

Guidelines on business.gov.au text styles

On this page
  • Heading styles
  • Body copy styles
  • Header & card styles
  • Examples and assets

Heading styles

Heading 1 (h1)

Desktop

Heading 1 on desktop

h1 {
    color: #333333;
    font-family: OpenSans-Semibold;
    font-size: 44px
    letter-spacing: 0;
    line-height: 56px;
}

Mobile

Heading 1 on mobile

h1 {    
    color: #333333;
    font-family: OpenSans-Semibold;
    font-size: 32px;
    letter-spacing: 0;
    line-height: 36px;
}

Heading 2 (h2)

Desktop

Heading 2 on desktop

h2 {
    color: #333333;
    font-family: OpenSans-Semibold;
    font-size: 32px;
    letter-spacing: 0;
    line-height: 40px;
}

Mobile

Heading 2 on mobile

h2 {
    color: #333333;
    font-family: OpenSans-Semibold;
    font-size: 24px;
    letter-spacing: 0;
    line-height: 30px;
}

Desktop

    font-size: 21px;
    letter-spacing: 0;
    line-height: 28px;
}

    line-height: 30px;

    line-height: 28px;

Body copy styles

Body

Desktop

Body text on desktop - Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectet adipiscing elit.

p {
    color: #333333;
    font-family: OpenSans;
    font-size: 16px;
    letter-spacing: 0.2px;
    line-height: 28px;
}

Mobile

Body text on mobile - Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectet adipiscing elit.

p {
    color: #333333;
    font-family: OpenSans;
    font-size: 16px;
    letter-spacing: 0.2px;
    line-height: 28px;
}

Body mini

Desktop

Mini body text on desktop - Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectet adipiscing elit.

p.mini {
    color: #333333;
    font-family: OpenSans;
    font-size: 14px;
    letter-spacing: 0;
    line-height: 24px;
}

Mobile

Mini body text on mobile - Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectet adipiscing elit.

p.mini {
    color: #333333;
    font-family: OpenSans;
    font-size: 14px;
    letter-spacing: 0;
    line-height: 24px;
}

List

Desktop

  • List style on desktop
  • Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectet adipiscing elit.
List text styles
li  {
    color: #333333;
    font-family: OpenSans;
    font-size: 16px;
    letter-spacing: 0;
    line-height: 28px;
}
Bullet
    color: #c18100;
    height: 8px;
    width: 8px;

Mobile

  • List style on mobile
  • Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectet adipiscing elit.
List text styles
li {
    color: #333333;
    font-family: OpenSans;
    font-size: 16px;
    letter-spacing: 0.2px;
    line-height: 24px;
}
Bullet
    color: #c18100;
    height: 8px;
    width: 8px;

Quote

Desktop

Block quotes are centered in the middle of the page like this.

Chloe Richardson, Product Owner
Quotation mark
.quotation-mark {    
    color: #F3DEA7;
    width: 40px;
    height: 24px;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
}
Quote
p.quote {
    color: #333333;
    font-family: OpenSans;
    font-size: 21px;
    letter-spacing: 0.2px;
    text-align: center;
    line-height: 40px;
}
Source
p.source {
    color: #666666;
    font-family: OpenSans-Italic;
    font-size: 16px;
    letter-spacing: 0;
    text-align: center;
    line-height: 24px;
}
Divider
hr {
    color: #EDCA72;
    height: 2px;
    width: 42px;
}

Mobile

Block quotes are centered in the middle of the page like this.

Chloe Richardson, Product Owner
Quotation mark
.quotation-mark {   
    color: #F3DEA7;
    width: 40px;
    height: 24px;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
}
Quote
p.quote {
    color: #333333;
    font-family: OpenSans;
    font-size: 18px;
    letter-spacing: 0.2px;
    text-align: center;
    line-height: 24px;
}
Source
p.source {
    color: #666666;
    font-family: OpenSans-Italic;
    font-size: 16px;
    letter-spacing: 0;
    text-align: center;
    line-height: 24px;
}

{
    color: #EDCA72;
    height: 2px;
    width: 42px;
}

Header and card styles

Header: Introduction

Desktop

Header introduction on desktop - Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectet adipiscing elit.

p.intro {
    color: #333333;
    font-family: OpenSans;
    font-size: 18px;
    letter-spacing: 0.2px;
    line-height: 30px;
}

Mobile

Header introduction on mobile - Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectet adipiscing elit.

p.intro {
    font-family: OpenSans;
    font-size: 16px;
    color: #333333;
    letter-spacing: 0.2px;
    line-height: 28px;
}

Header: Updated

Desktop

Updated: 15 March 2019

p.updated {
    color: #333333;
    font-family: OpenSans-Italic;
    font-size: 12px;
    letter-spacing: 0.2px;
    line-height: 18px;
}

Mobile

Updated: 15 March 2019

p.updated {
    color: #333333;
    font-family: OpenSans-Italic;
    font-size: 12px;
    letter-spacing: 0.2px;
    line-height: 16px;
}

Header & card: Category labels

Desktop

Label on desktop

p.label {
    color: #333333;
    font-family: OpenSans;
    font-size: 12px;
    letter-spacing: 0.2px;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    line-height: 20px;
}

Mobile

Label on mobile

p.label {
    color: #333333;
    font-family: OpenSans;
    font-size: 12px;
    letter-spacing: 0.2px;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    line-height: 20px;
}
